rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0002
rows.name: Dialogue and battle end here, Lao.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0006
rows.name: Can you do it, Elma?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0007
rows.name: Do you know where in my body the data [System:Ruby rt=device ]terminal[/System:Ruby] is?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0009
rows.name: Shoot, come on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0010
rows.name:
The chest!?
The head!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0010_2
rows.name: The probability is fifty-fifty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Entrusting the fate of humanity to that finger of yours.
Isn't it the best![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0012
rows.name: Yeah that's right, it's the best moment![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0003
rows.name: Please stop, Elma-san![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0004
rows.name: Move aside, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0005
rows.name: I will shut down his [System:Ruby rt=B.B. ]Blue Blood[/System:Ruby] and extract the data [System:Ruby rt=device ]terminal[/System:Ruby] hidden inside.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0014
rows.name:
Both of you, please stop already!
Aren't you comrades of the same BLADE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0015
rows.name: You[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0016
rows.name: Even you[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0017
rows.name: Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0018
rows.name:
Elma-san.
I... understand Lao-san's feelings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0019
rows.name: My father and mother died a long time ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0020
rows.name: But[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0021
rows.name: If... if they had been abandoned on Earth and died[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0022
rows.name:
I think I would definitely hate the people who survived!
I think I would have done the same thing as Lao-san![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0023
rows.name: Lin-san[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0024
rows.name:
It's ugly, isn't it.
It's dirty, isn't it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0024_2
rows.name: But... that's just how humans are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0025
rows.name: Perhaps it might be better if we disappeared from the universe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0027
rows.name: But[ST:wide ]— But![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0028
rows.name: Lin[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0029
rows.name: Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0029_2
rows.name:
It's the data [System:Ruby rt=device ]terminal[/System:Ruby].
Take it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0030
rows.name: Eh!? Lao-san[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0031
rows.name:
As you said, humans are ugly and dirty.
So, this is probably what should be done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0032
rows.name: Lao[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0033
rows.name: I changed my mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0034
rows.name: You changed your mind?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0035
rows.name: It was something I started out of personal emotion to begin with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0036
rows.name: it became about me. And about revenge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0037
rows.name: Lao-san[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0038
rows.name: Go on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0039
rows.name: The Central Life should have defense mechanisms too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0040
rows.name:
Even they won't be able to destroy it immediately.
If you hurry, you might make it in time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0041
rows.name:
Certainly, we cannot waste time.
Lin, can you analyze the [System:Ruby rt=device ]terminal[/System:Ruby] here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0042
rows.name: It's not impossible, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0043
rows.name:
Since it doesn't have the performance of NLA's computer,
it will take a considerable amount of time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0044
rows.name:
It can't be helped.
Let's return to NLA once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0048
rows.name: Lao-san, let's go back to NLA together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0049
rows.name:
Don't be stupid.
There's no way I can return after doing something like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0050
rows.name:
That's not true!
I'm sure everyone feels the same as Lao-san.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0051
rows.name:
So if you talk to them properly,
I think they will understand![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0052
rows.name:
Even so, what face should I make when meeting them?
I'm a great sinner![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0053
rows.name:
Yes, what you did is absolutely unforgivable.
That is precisely why you must return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0054
rows.name: Elma, even you[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0055
rows.name: Let's go home, Lao-san.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0056
rows.name:
Understood.
But time is precious. Go ahead first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0057
rows.name: That's true, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0057_2
rows.name: Elma-san[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0058
rows.name:
It's as Lao says.
I understand your feelings, but we don't have time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0059
rows.name: I understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0060
rows.name:
Lao-san, we will call for rescue,
so please don't move from here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0061
rows.name:
Also, please don't die.
Please return to NLA alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0062
rows.name:
Yeah, I'll definitely return alive.
So go already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0063
rows.name: Yes[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0064
rows.name: Tatsu will share Tatsu's bento box with you-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0065
rows.name:
You have to eat and live properly!
It's no good otherwise-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0066
rows.name:
If you don't understand Lin-san's feelings,
I won't forgive you-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0067
rows.name: Those guys... "Don't die," huh[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0067_2
rows.name: I can't die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0068
rows.name:
Even if I lose this body,
my consciousness will be transferred to a new body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0069
rows.name: Charmaine, Chenshi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0069_2
rows.name: Hey[ST:wide ]— I[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0070
rows.name: It seems I still can't go to where you are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0070_2
rows.name: I'm beaten.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0071
rows.name: Sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0071_2
rows.name: Wait there for me a little longer.[ST:wait ]
